website_summaries.verdict: The round design of the brush bristles does a very good job of getting baby teeth clean.
pros: Does a better job of cleaning than some others on the market
Allows babies and toddlers to get more teeth clean than other brushes
Some kids tolerate this brush better than standard brushes
cons: This toothbrush is susceptible to dirt and mold growth if left wet

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: We got it on June 5th. My daughter seems to like this tooth brush. She uses it twice a day. I was really happy with it, at first... Then this morning (June 12th), it broke apart into little pieces (see pictures) in my daughter's mouth. Luckily she didn't swallow them. I understand that this is a toothbrush and not a chewing toy. But you would expect a toddler biting it, especially with the 360 design, right? It's a very nice product if it doesn't break down!
customer_reviews.author: Rong Gao

customer_reviews.title: Not brilliant. Grows mold! See for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Not brilliant. Grows mold! See for yourself. I am super conscientious about keeping my baby’s bottle parts and toothbrushes clean. I noticed after week of use, they start to grow mold. There’s nothing you can do about it except throw them away. Yay! More plastic in landfills : ( I have used my steam sanitizer, boiled these and tried to dry the bristles after use to no avail. I disassembled one of the “Brilliant” toothbrushes so you can see for yourself how so much moisture gets trapped inside the sandwiched bristle discs making a perfect breeding ground for mold.
customer_reviews.author: EDP/CP

customer_reviews.title: Beware if your baby is a biter
customer_reviews.text: My son has never liked brushing his teeth. So I was thrilled when he tolerated this 360 toothbrush; I even recently bought more, happy to make life easier for the both of us. That all changed when my kiddo bit down on it and gagged on a tiny plastic washer that came off. Luckily he spit it out. Needless to say all of these toothbrushes are all in the trash now. If your baby is a biter, I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C

customer_reviews.title: Although the design is brilliant and my little one loves this toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Although the design is brilliant and my little one loves this toothbrush, the little bristles are so thin and dense that whatever bits of lint that get in between are very difficult to clean out. Basically, in just a few days the brush looks dirty with all kinds of little dust particles stuck between the bristles. I spend hours cleaning it out with a pin, just to make it look/taste decent to my baby. After about a month of brushing, the plastic on the very tip flakes off and could be swallowed. Need to replace this once a month, at least.
customer_reviews.author: lw4692

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product, it allows me to clean my sons teeth front and back very well . I saw a few reviewers talk about mold issues? The only way mold would grow is if they didn’t dry the toothbrush off after using, you can’t just leave a wet toothbrush out, that’s just asking for bacteria to grow on your tooth brush. And especially since this one the bristles are dense and close together. I just dry it well with a paper towel and no issues so far love it! Deff a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and t happened to me! MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews about it getting moldy, I figured I’d take extra care of it so it wouldn’t happen to me. I followed all instructions, always rinsed it well, dri d it with a baby rag, and set it out to completely air dry. Never put it in a closed cap, never left it dirty, and it got moldy in less than a month! I’m so disappointed because my baby loved it (18 months old). We finally found one that he wouldn’t frown at when it came time to brush the teeth, but it was short lived. Very disappointed! Money down the drain. Great concept, incorrect materials, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: photoglady

customer_reviews.title: Good starter toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter brush for babies who are learning to brush for the first time. Since babies are still learning, most of the time they are just chewing on whatever objects they are holding. We gave this to our twins and they were able to hold it and chew on the end as intended. The all around bristles meant that their teeth were getting cleaned no matter which way the toothbrush was held. After they are done chewing on it, we take the same brush and help them brush some more so they could get used to feeling the toothbrush in their mouths. This toothbrush made the transition to a regular one easier later.
customer_reviews.author: HDN

customer_reviews.title: A cool toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very, very soft on this brush. It's great for brushing the fronts of my daughter's teeth, because she hates brushing her teeth. We don't use it every time, as we have a few other brushes that work a little bit better (firmer bristles, I feel like they do a better job cleaning). And I probably wouldn't let a baby chew on this unsupervised, as it might fall apart. But it's a nice brush and can make it easier to get into little mouths that are resistant to tooth brushing time.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Brush
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! My 14-month-old son started teething very early at one year he had 18 teeth fully in! Brushing that many teeth efficiently on a wiggly baby was very hard, at our first dentist visit I told the dentist I was having trouble brushing efficiently, she suggested this toothbrush. It’s bristles are all over, as well as the bristles are very fine and compact this way providing an efficient clean of the top bottom and sides of the tooth in one swipe in place of having to go on each side of the tooth which can be long process with the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Mizcheffy

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were highly overpriced to begin with, but I bought them because there didn’t seem to be another option. But this toothbrush strayed falling apart on the 2nd use! Luckily my son is old enough now to realize that something had fallen off and into his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: For adults, too!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an adult, and love using this unique toothbrush! I have very sensitive teeth and gums and a small mouth, with tight teeth. This has been the only toothbrush I’ve ever used that really reaches the teeth in the very back of my mouth, and all the other teeth, too. It doesn’t rip up my gums either. I just brush with tiny gentle circles and take my time. I tried going back to a regular toothbrush for sensitive teeth when my first one of these wore out, but regretted it big time, and ordered another of these fast!
customer_reviews.author: Charisma33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby learning how to brush teeth
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for babies just learning how to brush teeth. The 360 degree brush helped me to feel confident that baby was brushing the toothbrush against their teeth. This helped the child correctly know what the toothbrush felt like, and made them feel independent and proud of themselves. I truly believe this toothbrush gave me the ideal conditions to create a healthy teeth cleaning habit for baby. Helps them learn colors too when you ask them which toothbrush they'd like. Cheap enough to replace, and good enough to gift!
customer_reviews.author: E Cij

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a product that will take off the milk build up on my baby's tongue and this is PERFECT! The little plastic brushes that you put on your finger does not do the job. This is intended for 4 months or older babies, but I used this on my one month old and it was fine. I dampen the brush with water (make sure to soak off excess water so baby doesn't choke) and then I position the brush where the milk build up is and roll while applying gentle pressure. Rinse and repeat as many times as needed to get everything off.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: “Holy smokes it’s the best softest toothbrush for babies”!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this toothbrush for my little toddler. It’s the best toothbrush for a baby with new teeth. I had a very hard time brushing my babies teeth with the old fashioned shaped toothbrushes because they would make my little ones teeth hurt from the brushing. But once I found this toothbrush Holy smokes! My little one lets me brush his teeth without a darn hassle & even opens his mouth for his teeth to get brushed because this toothbrush is very very gentle to his teeth & gums and he doesn’t make a fuss while brushing his teeth everyday. This brush I highly highly recommend for babies w new teeth coming out and for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel G.

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best Toothbrush for an Infant or Toddler
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried two or three other toothbrushes, but this is is just leaps and bounds better. The bristles are densely packed but very soft, and the 360-degree design is perfect! My son likes walking around just chewing on the bristles without thinking about it. Before it was a struggle to get him to brush at all. One word of caution: Don't let your child run around with this in their mouth because if they trip it could really hurt their teeth, palate, or throat if they fell down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about starting to brush my LO's teeth. He'll be 2 in December, and, at first, he didn't like it because he doesn't like being tamed or not doing things on his own. Once he realized that once I was done getting a good brush in and he could do it afterwards, he loved it. Brushing his teeth at night now is fun for him and he doesn't even mind it if I brush his teeth first.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Lee

customer_reviews.title: but I don't know that this will be better than a standard toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be THE ANSWER for my family, but I feel very meh about it. The toothbrush head is so small. Maybe we are ready for stage 6, but I don't know that this will be better than a standard toothbrush. Honestly we are still using this company's "1st toothbrush/teether" in combination with a traditional toothbrush and that seems to be just fine. This wasn't for us and that is ok. Also beware the dishwasher. Some of the bristles melted after the dishwasher?
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: Go to toothbrush for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say how much money I had previously spent on toothbrushes to get my toddler 18 months to not fight me on brushing his teeth. I finally gave into spending the approx $10 on this toothbrush and I wish I just purchased this to begin with. He still fights it sometimes (there is no magical toothbrush for that), but with bristles all around it is a much thorough clean than if I had used a standard brush. This will be our go to for him and future children. Worth the sticker shock in regards to a toddler toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMcG

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush. My 18 month old is super independent and likes to brush her teeth herself. Or should I say refuses to let me brush her teeth. I literally have to hold her down once a day to do it myself. She pretty much has all of her teeth and the dentist suggests brushing twice a day. Um mm yeah that sounds easy enough....lol. I love the 360 degree bristles on this brush. I feel like it hits more spots especially when she brushes her teeth herself. She actually brushes longer with this toothbrush. I plan to purchase more of these because they work better than the regular toothbrush in my oponion. The other toothbrushes do not compare.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great for stubborn tot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (2) is very sensitive to people touching anywhere around her face and her mouth is usually off limits, She would let me use the old toothbrush sometimes but it's was nearly impossible to clean when she was having (less than willing) nights. She still does not love to brush but at least with the bristles all around I am able to clean more teeth faster with the little amount of access my toddler gives me. The bristles are very soft, I think it helps, she doesn't seem as horrified when I scrub. But this also means if your kid bites down a lot, it will wear out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old hated brushing her teeth with other toothbrushes, including Dr. Brown’s. I’d have to use 2 toothbrushes in order to kind of be able to brush her teeth. I got these hoping they’d help, and they do! She loves biting down on these and will let me brush her teeth like she’s never done before. She actually wants to have her teeth brushed. I’d recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Piper

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I heard this was good from my baby but it was not my type. They are too narrow so in my case I have to brush my baby's teeth before I hand over to my daughter I am too busy to brush for 5 seconds. Because she wants to do herself but if I give her before my turn she just sucks tooth paste. I wish they were little bit bigger than now..I don't think I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Ella Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for my toddler who bites the brush
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I've been using them for my son since he was ~18 months old because he fights teeth-brushing and would always bite down on the brush as I tried to get his molars. That not only made brushing hard, but he would actually puncture the plastic/rubber on the back side of the regular toddler toothbrushes - don't want him ingesting that of course. With bristles on all sides I just keep brushing away as he tries to bite down :).
customer_reviews.author: glh01

customer_reviews.title: Best baby toothbrush I have used!
customer_reviews.text: Softest bristles I have purchased for my little guy. The other toothbrushes I had previously felt too hard, no matter how gently I brushed his teeth. I can also use this to brush his gums, cheeks and tongue so I know his mouth is getting cleaned without scratching it up or causing little micro-tears that could get infected; especially while teeth are erupting. This product gives me peace of mind now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Favorite baby toothbrush! The 360 bristle feature allows for optimum cleaning for the short burst your kid lets you in. Also, you don’t have the hard backing to worry about hurting them while trying to brush their teeth. The bristles are also really soft so, for the mixture of teeth and gums it’s really gentle. My only gripe is that the bristles attract a lot of lint. I don’t even know where it comes from, but inevitably, lint ends up between the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: JasminA

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates the hardest part of brushing for me
customer_reviews.text: Man, it’s so hard brushing my sons teeth. He just feels the need to grab everything out of my hand to examine it, and he also hates when I put foreign objects like food and toothbrushes in his mouth. With a regular toothbrush chances are he’ll end up flipping the wrong way or I’ll have to keep it in one direction while taking too long to distract his mouth open with tickles. But this makes it so much easier! Just wet and put toothpaste on it, and I can just hold the brush any which way and go for his teeth as I play peekaboo. Little dude barely notices now! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aulivia Daft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for brushing a small dog's teeth
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for brushing our small poodle's (20lbs) teeth. We have tried multiple toothbrushes sold at pet stores (finger brushes, finger cloth wipes, dual sided dog toothbrushes) with no success. They were all too big to maneuver around in a small dog's mouth and the bristles are much softer than other toothbrushes. This is the first time our dog hasn't had a meltdown when we brushed her teeth; in fact, she seemed to hardly notice. This needs to be sold in every pet store!
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best brush!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get a 12m old to let you brush her teeth can sometimes be a battle. When you have literal seconds to try and get teeth as clean as possible, having bristles all around covers more area in less time and not having to worry about having the brush head facing the right direction. Worth every penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it got moldy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it got moldy. Made getting into the routine of brushing easier. Rinsed it each time before and after use and set it upright to dry. Still got moldy under the plastic where it attaches to the handle. Lasted 2 months. Kind of expensive for just 2 months. Good concept though.
customer_reviews.author: E.Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Our baby just turned one. We had first started using this when he was 10-11 months old. He loved it and still loving it. It is super soft and small enough for his tiny mouth. I love that the brush is round and it makes brushing such a breeze as it gets onto the top and bottom of gums simultaneously especially when baby is in one of his moods on some days and you want to get this part of cleaning routine done with. We use hello oral care toothpaste with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a squirmy toddler! So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Tried every type of toothbrush for my 15 month old and this is the only one that got the job done quickly and efficiently. Removed all the plaque off of his teeth and works great! It is so easy to use, especially for the backs of teeth and with a squirmy toddler. This toothbrush is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog teeth
customer_reviews.text: I use this to brush my (very stubborn) dog’s teeth and it works incredibly well. My dog hates the finger toothbrush which has hard bristles and the normal dog toothbrush which is not 360 degrees. This one I can sneak in some more brushing more easily since it can turn whichever way while brushing.
customer_reviews.author: bliss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect doggie toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to see the difference between this and a soft adult version they make. The only difference I found was the handle size is smaller for the baby version and the bristle part is 1 row smaller. I use these brushes on my dog. They are perfect. I get much more cleaning done with a small, 360 brush head. Actual dog tooth brushes feature bristles that are too hard, which is painful for my pup and would surely erode his gums. Make sure your dog does not excessively chew or the head will break off. Moderate chewing is ok, the design is solid :)
customer_reviews.author: rayray

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 degree toothbrush for an intolerant child
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad this exists. Trying to brush a baby or toddler's teeth is hard. They like to chew on the toothbrush and God forbid you try to help.... This helps them get the top and bottom teeth as they chew on it. It really cuts down on the torture time when you step in to help.
customer_reviews.author: mama4512

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Before we ordered this toothbrush, we had been using finger brush for my 10 month old. Tooth brushing was a crying battle every day. From the first time we used this brush my son loved it. The bristles are very soft and the portion that goes into his mouth is much smaller than the finger tooth brushes. The all around bristles allow me to brush his top and bottom teeth at the same time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this toothbrush. He has 6 teeth fully in already at 11 months. He likes when we twirl it in his mouth to brush his teeth. He loves just carrying it and chewing it( watch obviously Incase baby’s with teeth try biting Brissels), the only con I would say is- it somehow magically gets all the fuzz stuck inside the brissels! Which is kind of annoying, but I have remedy , use a sewing needle and pull outwards and pull out each fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: J bean

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 1 1/2 and hated brushing his teeth. I ordered this to make it easier on me and ended up he loves trying to brush his own teeth and lets me help him. I would definitely recommend it. And based on other reviews of it falling apart, I never let him chew on it or use it unsupervised.
customer_reviews.author: christina younkin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush helps so much to get all of my child’s teeth. She doesn’t sit still for long, ever! So to try and brush her teeth has been somewhat of a nightmare. This is so easy as you can just spin it and it gets top and bottom and cuts the time in half. The bristles don’t seem to bother her and he has several teeth coming in and some sore gums. This has worked well for her so far.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this for my 7 month old getting her first two bottom teeth. She can practically brush her teeth by herself with this product! The bristles are very fine, but thick. No need for paste, just water. She bites on it like a teether and it keeps its shape. I'm able to brush her gums and teeth without getting my fingers pinched unlike with those blue silicone finger brushes they sell. I wish I had had this with my first child.
customer_reviews.author: Drug Waitress, RNTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for little ones but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toothbrush for my stubborn little one that hates teeth brushing time. Allows me to get in there and know that no matter what direction the brush is, it’s getting the job done. However, the price is a bit much to continue buying every time it’s time for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cass1

customer_reviews.title: The best toothbrush so far
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different brands and styles of toothbrush to try to get my 1 year old to not resist brushing and this is the first one he's into. It does a great job of getting into all the areas of the mouth since he is too little to know to turn the brush around and get all the places himself. Soft bristles and no shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna L Yorty

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: I brought these toothbrush based on other mom's recommendation but I found it hard to use, especially when I tried to brush my daughter's front teeth. The toothbrush is too bulky to go in between her lip and teeth. The bristle is not as soft as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is a Christmas Miracle, my 18 month HATES having her teeth brushed, and I've purchased more toddler toothbrushes than I care to admit, trying to find the magical one that she'll allow. This is it. It's soft, double sided - which is necessary when you have to get in there and get out QUICK, you can do the top and bottom molars at the same time. Perfect for a picky kid!
customer_reviews.author: afviolin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars is not enough for this product. My son is almost 6 and has autism along with really bad oral sensory issues. He has never brushed his teeth without a huge fight and gagging usually ending in throwing up. Yesterday when that toothbrush came he was so excited to use it. He actually brushed the full 2 minutes and asked to do it again! I will continue to buy these toothbrushes for him. I wish I would have known about them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: This one works great, he just puts it in his mouth and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old would not let me brush his teeth with any toothbrush. And trust me I've tried several toothbrush. Regular, Finger, Light up, vibrating ones, changing tooth pastes. This one works great, he just puts it in his mouth and chews around..I like that it's 360 degrees so works on the top & bottom teeth at the same time. The only cons is the price..I wouldn't want to pay more than $6 for it..its a little pricey so I just got one
customer_reviews.author: BRY

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical at first but we stuck with it and now my 20 month old daughter does great with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 20 month old daughter and she didn't seem to like it as much as the regular kids toothbrush at first. I do think it's a little strange that you only use this with water and I think it was overpriced. But I like that it is 360 and she basically just chews on it so it gets both her upper and lower teeth at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: ERG

customer_reviews.title: So great but such a lint magnet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old loveeees this tooth brush (he "brushes" his own teeth with it while i use a finger brush to brush his first)... BUT it is such a lint magnet i cannot even believe it! We've had it for 2 weeks and i will have to replace it already so i wish they weren't $10 each!!! The brush is already completely black with lint and i don't know how to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tooth brushes for my baby!!! All you have to worry about is getting the tooth brush in baby’s mouth, you dont have to think about the correct angle, it’s 360, it adapts from any side. It is very soft, bristles are thick so it does the job well. As a dental hygienist, I highly recommend it for my littlest patients. It is more splurgy but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Baby bite it like teether
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s really works for the baby. Because my baby only have 2 teeth lol. She just bites on it like a teething toys. It is a little expensive for the price compare with regular kids tooth brush. But it is 360 degree.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It was a good way to clean their teeth while they could chew ...
customer_reviews.text: Started around 9-months for our little one and used up until 20 months. It was a good way to clean their teeth while they could chew on it. That makes them harder to dry out. I made sure I kept it vertical facing some sunlight, so it doesn't get moldy. Ordered it twice before it was time to move on to a real toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toothbrush for baby’s delicate mouth
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this. Got it when he was 2.5 months just so I could get him used to a toothbrush. I think the bristles fee good on his gums because he always smiles while I brush them. Easy to clean. Super soft bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazed

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones! But a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and so helpful to have for little ones. It makes brushing so much easier as you aren’t constantly having to turn the brush. I don’t care that they don’t last long (as noted by other reviewers), as you should really change out toothbrushes every 30 days, but at more than $6 a brush ... they are a bit pricey for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but poor quality. It gathers dust or mold from being wet not sure which. I washed the first and set it out to dry and it had dark spots at the top the next day. I tried to wash it and was unable to. So I used the second new brush. I washed and dried it with a paper towel and the same thing happened to the second and third brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK but a little weird
customer_reviews.text: I like these for my daughter to chew on because they are round. The problem is that they have a super hard little too on the top. It'd be nice if it was either cover with bristles there too, not there at all or even if it had a softer rubber. Other ten that they do get particles and hairs stuck in them quickly but I still like them. Probably won't buy them again though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey A. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Easier brushing for resistant toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This makes brushing my toddler's teeth a little easier and quicker. She doesn't enjoy the process, so a regular toothbrush getting flipped around as she pushes her tongue against it is annoying and slows the process. With this one, the teeth are getting clean as long as I can make contact with the tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: No Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've previously ordered this brand of toothbrush, and we actually love it. However, when I ordered it most recently, the three toothbrushes came without packaging and were loose in a plastic bag. That is disgusting and unsanitary - who know where the toothbrushes were before they were put in that bag. This is a negative review for the packaging (or lack thereof) and not the actually toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: lovebat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and thorough
customer_reviews.text: I use these for brushing my small dog's teeth, and they are excellent. They are sturdy, yet soft on the gums, and get the teeth cleaned no matter which position they turn while in his mouth. I used these with my babies, so I thought they might work with my dog. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great & my child LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Although it collects lint easily, my toddler loves this and cries when I try to take it away. This is the best toothbrush we have ever used for our child, and I wish I had known about it when the first teeth came in. This has been so helpful because brushing a small toddler's teeth with anything is a nightmare in my household. Keep it covered if you want to mitigate the lint-collecting aspect since it is difficult to clean. I'll probably start giving these as gifts at baby showers since I like it so much.

customer_reviews.title: Soft Bristle Brush
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like having his teeth cleaned. He seems to do pretty well with this one. I haven't experienced any of the bristles falling out of the toothbrush. Overall, I'm very satisfied, as with a few mommy tweaks I can get his teeth brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Dirty after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The bristles get so dirty after a few uses and I’ve tried cleaning with baking soda and vinegar. Such a waste for a $15 toothbrush
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many toothbrushes until I found this one. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many toothbrushes until I found this one. It is a challenge with my little baby since he would bite down on the brush and I couldn't brushed his teeth properly. This one allows me to try to brush both his top and bottom teeth at once hence reducing the time to complete this while my baby is wiggling around trying to escape the brushing time.
customer_reviews.author: aimz

customer_reviews.title: Mine got moldy...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I liked the 360 aspect for my 12 month old to use...but like others said, it gets moldy after rinsing and air drying. I saw these tiny black specks growing, yikes! When it wasn't moldy, it worked great and my kid enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: i think it will br great for when the first tooth/teeth come in - against ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby (4months old) likes it! Holds it well and chews on it:) not teething yet but coming up...i think it will br great for when the first tooth/teeth come in - against the pain to chew on something eventhough this brush is very soft(which is great!) it might just dostract rather than putting pressure on pain spots. It is a Great first baby's toothbrush for cleaning and getting them used to brushing their teeth in early age!
customer_reviews.author: Sabri & Fred

customer_reviews.title: Easier to brush top and bottom teeth with a laughing kid
customer_reviews.text: My baby laughs and doesn't want to let me brush her teeth. She knows brushing teeth means bedtime so she is trying to avoid it. Tooth brush is easy enough to use, I can distract her and gently put it in. It takes a few try since she also loves sucking the kids toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Turnberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toothbrush for babies. I’ve been using this brand since my baby’s first tooth came in. The bristles are soft enough to not irritate his guns, but strong enough to keep his teeth clean. The bristles being 360 really help make brushing my baby’s teeth a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Yusaku

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: He looks forward to tooth-brushing time as part of our bedtime routine. He seems to really enjoy how the bristles feel in his mouth, and the 360-degree bristles make it easy for me to get all sides of his teeth. Highly, highly recommend. Just the right softness and size for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: I let my daughter brush her teeth in the bath ...
customer_reviews.text: I let my daughter brush her teeth in the bath tub every night. She LOVES this thing and I can hear the bristles hitting her teeth :) I put a little baby toothpaste on there for flavor and she brushes the whole time she's in the tub :) I was hesitant because of the price, but it's worth it! I know her teeth are getting clean and I can't wait to brag to the dentist that she brushes every night with this thing :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is very easy to use, I give the eldest daughter and the second daughter are using this, the brush head is particularly soft and easy to use, the child is too hard to brush also do not hurt, but it will not take two months to brush the head deformation and want to change, the price is a little expensive
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothbrush for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is gentle yet effective at thoroughly cleaning my toddler’s teeth. I use a toothbrush cover over the bristles when not in use and have not had any issues with the toothbrush collecting dust or mold.
customer_reviews.author: crème.brûlée

customer_reviews.title: As described! Watch videos on it... perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Totally impressed!so soft, so easy to use. Using on my 2yr old toddler grandson...going to buy the bigger kids one for my 5yr old grandson. He loved it, allowed me to brush his teeth without fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush so much!!! I had bought it two times. When my daughter has teeth, I start to help her brush tooth. 360° toothbrush is good design for baby. And my daughter love to brush her tooth everyday.
customer_reviews.author: freyawu

customer_reviews.title: This toothbrush is absolutely perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is absolutely perfect for toddlers. My ONLY complaint is that food and fuzzies get stuck in the bristles and get so wedged in there that I spend forever trying to keep this toothbrush clean. A small price to pay, though, since brushing my daughter's teeth with this brush is so much easier than with any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my small dog. Was looking for something like this for a long while and glad I found it. Appreciate that the bristles are soft as I found a similar design elsewhere but the bristles were much thicker and tougher which I assume would be painful on gums. Will probably also use for my future bb too.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: This was a great starter toothbrush after the silicone ones as the round ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great starter toothbrush after the silicone ones as the round brush made it easy for my son to actually "brush" his teeth. Had no issue with bristles falling out but had to make sure they dried properly as the bristles are very thin and densely placed making it easy for mold to form. They are very soft so they get misshapen easily also. They're a bit pricey for children's toothbrush but the 360 brush and softness of the bristles won me over.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Dulin

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I was using the silicone finger sleeve before I came across the Baby Buddy 360. I was amazed at how soft the bristles were, but even more amazed at how effectively it seems to clean my little one's teeth! The 360 degree design does double the work to make brush time more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine P.

customer_reviews.title: 360-degree bristles are genius
customer_reviews.text: Toddlers are mini drunk people. Watching them brush their teeth with a regular-shaped toothbrush (because they insist on doing it “by me-self!”) is both adorable and cringeworthy. Also, it takes 9 hours. People: this 360-degree toothbrush is the best parenting hack I’d never heard of. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good but collects lint
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews saying they grew mold but I only saw that over time it collected lint. Still worked for its purpose to teach my little one to brush her teeth. When it collected lint I just replaced it. There’s 3 in a package so no issue
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this! Loves brushing her teeth. She’s just 1 and has like 3 teeth but points to the brush every time she’s in the bathroom!!! 🙂 totally hit and it’s so soft
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Praveen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Shih Tzu
customer_reviews.text: My dog Lizzie has a tiny mouth and was always really good at getting me to brush her lips but with the infant sized brush I am actually brushing her teeth at last. For me (and Lizzie) the toothbrush is a welcomed miracle so big thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This definitely makes toddler tooth brushing easier! I took one star off because the price seems kind of ridiculous compared to other baby toothbrushes- I'm ok with paying a little more for something that works better, but geez.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great must buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I used this with my first baby who didn't like to let me brush; then now with my second and the fact that the bristles are everywhere helps so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Toddler can brush her own teeth and wants to
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! Or I should say my 17month daughter does. Tooth brushing was becoming a battle and after getting this brush I ask her if she wants to brush her teeth and believe it or not she comes running! She loves brushing her teeth herself and this gives the independence to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean inside
customer_reviews.text: wow,so cool,I bought other teethbrush,my baby is so little,she can not brush her teeth,she just like to bite and suck,she want to brush by herself,oh......wow,that's great for her to do it,I will recommend it to my friend
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. It might be me but baby likes to walk around while chewing on these brushes and during the process gathers a whole bunch of lint whenever he touched anything and it is so hard to remove it. Just be careful to only use them during brushing sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush has been a great because it gives me an opportunity to attempt to brush my son's teeth in the short period of time he allows me to do so. Plus he enjoys the texture of the soft bristles so it's been put to good use!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toothbrush for babies because it gets their teeth from all angles. My little one is starting to want to hold the toothbrush while I brush which is fine because even with her holding it I am still able to brush her teeth in every direction. I can't believe more people don't use this toothbrush for their little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our toddler, letting him lead the way in the morning on brushing, and giving him a bit more guidance in the evening. The round heads mean you don’t need to get the angle right, and if you are lucky you end up brushing two rows of teeth at once! A bit expensive, but better than the regular ‘junior’ toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: jonny b

customer_reviews.title: Great first brush!
customer_reviews.text: Great first toothbrush for the little one. Easy for my toddler to hold and I love the round shape that it can get all over the mouth easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stenson

customer_reviews.title: Good toddler brush
customer_reviews.text: Besides the pricey side, I think it is a Perfect brush for toddler! I actually have tried couple different type of baby toothbrush, but none of them really works for my LO.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: baby friendly
customer_reviews.text: My baby daughter is 9.5 months and I tried to clean her gums and few teeth that was a struggle she didn't wanted me to, I tried a baby toothbrush from the supermarket and she was afraid after it touched her mouth the first time. This product is amazing. Is so gentle yet effective, it does clean. After the first try, my baby opens her mouth when I have to bush her few teeth. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Brushing my 1. 5 year old's teeth was such ...
customer_reviews.text: Brushing my 1.5 year old's teeth was such a challenge before these toothbrushes. These have made things much easier, especially because you can get the top and bottom teeth at the same time. Cuts the time and struggle in half. Many thanks to the inventor!!
customer_reviews.author: Cronzilla

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves brushing her teeth with this brush. Allows for all 360 coverage in small mouth. Worth the purchase and as training tooth brush.
customer_reviews.author: HHN

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased- it worked great
customer_reviews.text: I was totally surprised and pleased with this product. My 2 year old was toothbrush-phobic and would scream just looking at the cute cartoon toothbrushes we were buying. I presented him with this toothbrush and sure enough- it worked! It was immediate. Once he got comfortable with it we were able to switch back to normal toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste money to buy this. I bought This because it’s on sale like $5. The brush it’s very soft and my baby like it too. But after only few use, the brush got molds and it’s not cleanable. how can this be amazons choice!!!$5 for 3 times use?????
customer_reviews.author: Wing

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to brush my dachshund’s teeth. The bristles are soft so it’s not too harsh on his gums. I like that they wrap 360 degrees around the head so I can reach his teeth from most angles.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my 15 months old and I love it, it's not easy brushing an infant teeth, depending on mode sometimes she just doesn't want me to brush her teeth, so I make it into a game with turning the brush fast. And it's much easier brushing from the inside even if she closes their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Baby love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice round brush head design, easy for the baby to use. My son love to hold it and brush himself. Definitely recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning how to brush
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toothbrush and so do we. I love the fact that it has bristles 360 because 14 months don't know which side is the front vs the back so this makes for great practice so she gets in the habit of brushing. So far it's been great, I found this about 2 months ago and I've loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Yasi

customer_reviews.title: Soft All the Way Around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tiny tooth brush for my dog. It has soft bristles all the way aroumd the brush. No hard plastic to hit their gums. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Seeken66

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves brushing his teeth now!
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is amazing! My 18 month absolutely loves it! Actually let’s me brush his teeth an actual cried when we’re done cause he wants to keep going for some odd reason.. I think 10$ is a little pricey since o but him a new one every month but so far it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany m.

product_meta.title: Brilliant Baby Toothbrush by Baby Buddy - for Ages 4-24 Months, BPA Free Super-Fine Micro Bristles Clean All-Around Mouth, Kids Love Them, Mint, 3 Count
product_meta.description: Color:Green| Size:3 CountTurn brushing teeth with your child into a positive experience after every meal and at bedtime with Baby Buddy's Brilliant Baby Toothbrush of the Brilliant Oral Care System. The program guides you with innovative oral care products that grow with your child from birth. Starting from the Foundations and through Teething & Budding, the products are designed to take care of budding baby teeth with state of the art, safe and soft products that children love to chew on. During Teeth Eruption & Development, the program progresses to distinctive toothbrushes for ages 4 months to 5 years that easily clean those hard-to-reach places where food and plaque can build up and cause cavities and other oral problems. The Brilliant Toothbrush revolutionizes the industry with its innovative design featuring bristles 360˚ around the toothbrush head that are devised specifically for your child's tender teeth and gums. Over 10,000 short but highly elastic bristles gently massage gums and effectively clean the cheek and gums. And because of its unique design, brushing is always at a 45 degree angle, allowing parents and caretakers to brush teeth, tongue, and gums without needing to twist their wrist. This unique patented design can be used with water only to clean teeth to help remove harmful bacteria and sugar buildup that typically causes tooth decay. Developed in partnership with the Osaka University Infant Dental Clinic, the Brilliant Toothbrush effectively removes almost twice as much plaque as conventional, one-sided toothbrushes, when brushing for 2 minutes. The Brilliant Baby Toothbrush has been sized with a 4-24 month old in mind. Give your child the gift of a lifetime of good oral care habits with the innovative Brilliant Toothbrush. Check out our other Baby Buddy products because Every Baby Needs a Buddy.
feature_bullets: Baby Toothbrush of The Brilliant Oral Care Program that grows with you and your child from birth, customized for each age and stage, to help develop a love of brushing and good oral habits

Babies and toddlers love the Brilliant Baby Toothbrush and moms approve-innovative design featuring soft, round tip bristles 360˚ around brush head, allows for proper cleaning of teeth without twisting wrist
10 times more bristles enables greater removal of plaque, food particles and effectively cleans and massages baby's tongue, teeth and gums, when compared to conventional, one-sided toothbrushes
Easy, for home and on-the-go oral care! Can be used with water only. Designed to be more quick drying than a regular toothbrush
Brilliant Baby Toothbrush for your Baby’s Erupting teeth, ages 4-24 months, developed in partnership the Osaka University Infant Dental Clinic
